alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 11:46PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST CENTRAL AITKIN AND SOUTHEASTERN CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 AM CDT... At 1146 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Garrison, or 11 miles west of Mille Lacs Lake, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Upper South Long Lake around 1155 PM CDT. Garrison around 1200 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Deerwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
